attributes.action: SHOPS TO PAY 50% OF PROFIT TO THE GOVERNMENT WHEN USING PLASTIC
attributes.background: We are concerned about the plastic pollution in the oceans that is destroying sea life everywhere, everyday. We passionately believe in plastic being replaced by glass. We also believe that when shops use plastic, they should have to pay 50% of their profit to the government.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
